# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="48a2f-102">Meilisignatuuri loomine Outlookis veebis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48a2f-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="48a2f-103">Mine</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48a2f-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="48a2f-104">**Seaded** > **kõik Outlooki sätete vaatamine** > **koostamine ja neile vastamine**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48a2f-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="48a2f-105">Jaotises **e-posti allkiri**, tippige oma signatuur ja vormindamise Valikud abil saate muuta oma välimust.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48a2f-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48a2f-106">*Märkus:* Sul võib olla ainult üks allkiri konto kohta.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48a2f-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="48a2f-107">Lisateabe saamiseks vaadake [Loo ja lisada meilisõnumi allkirja Outlook Web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="48a2f-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
